content.description:
The following question is based on an excerpt of music that may be played 3 times. The excerpt is in two sections, as diagrammed below.
 Section 1Section 216 measures16 measuresphrase 1 + phrase 2phrase 1 + phrase 2
content.question: In relation to the melodic motive heard in section 1, the melodic motive heard in section 2 is

choices.label: developed by both pitch and rhythm

content.answer: developed by both pitch and rhythm

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
